title: Female infanticide, child marriages will increase, if inflation not controlled, says Jharkhand CM Hemant Soren - Times of India
content:
1. Female infanticide, child marriages will increase, if inflation not controlled, says Jharkhand CM Hemant Soren  Times of India
  2. Pay Rs 1.36 Lakh Crore For Mining In Jharkhand: Hemant Soren To Centre  NDTV
  3. Video| In attack on BJP, Jharkhand CM links inflation to female infanticide  Hindustan Times
  4. Female infanticide, child marriages will increase, if inflation not controlled, says Jharkhand CM  ThePrint
  5. Pay Rs 1.36 lakh crore coal-stock dues or...: Jharkhand CM warns defaulters  Zee News
  6. View Full coverage on Google News
description: Jharkhand Chief Minister Hemant Soren on Friday said if inflation is not controlled then cases of female infanticide and child marriages will increase in the country. While addressing the State Assembly on Friday, he said, “Cases of female infanticide, child marriage will increase in the coming days if we’ll not control inflation in the country.” He further claimed that campaigns like ‘Beti Bachao Beti Padhao’ will be finished as people will not have money to provide education to their daughters.
